testcase.name: Open Weather API testing with Parameters
testcase.system-out: Given User connects to Openweather website..................................passed Then Using Resource:/data/2.5/weather and Zip:03867,us and Key:3813494aebca6ec7206ddd5fedd5961b Assert that status code is ok.passed Then Using Resource:/data/2.5/weather and Zip:03867,us and Key:3813494aebca6ec7206ddd5fedd5961b Assert that response is in Json Format.passed Then Using Resource:/data/2.5/weather and Zip:03867,us and Key:3813494aebca6ec7206ddd5fedd5961b Validate the city name from response.passed Then Using Resource:/data/2.5/weather and Zip:03867,us and Key:3813494aebca6ec7206ddd5fedd5961b Get the temperature from your response.passed Then Using Resource:/data/2.5/weather and Zip:03867,us and Key:3813494aebca6ec7206ddd5fedd5961b Validate the response time.passed Then Using Resource:/data/2.5/weather and Zip:03867,us and Key:3813494aebca6ec7206ddd5fedd5961b Assert on the Latitude and Longitude from the response.passed
